results.title: Sirtuins as mediators and targets of arsenic toxicity: unraveling signaling pathway crosstalk.
results.text_hl: However, activating sirtuins with agents like @CHEMICAL_Resveratrol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077185 @@@resveratrol@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, or @CHEMICAL_Berberine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001599 @@@berberine@@@, as well as through lifestyle interventions, can counteract @<m>DISEASE_Arsenic_Poisoning</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020261 @@@arsenic toxicity@@@, restore cellular resilience, and provide new therapeutic strategies.
